column9: JSON doesn't support comments, which makes it hard to embed into host languages that use comments to determine the embedded language
JSONC is a variant of JSON that supports comments
CSV doesn't work yet. The most popular syntax highlighter (Rainbow CSV) has some kind of regex that consumes past the normal end-of-string flag

Mermaid doesn't work yet. The most popular syntax highlighter (Mermaid Markdown Syntax Highligher) uses a rule that expects the code block to end in ``` and the TextMate parser overruns the normal end-of-codeblock markers looking for that.
